com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.viewer
Interface BaseLabelProvider<T>

All Known Implementing Classes:
CellLabelProvider, LabelProvider, ModelCellLabelProvider, ModelLabelProvider
public interface BaseLabelProvider<T>

Tag interface for objects that can return labels for model objects.
